name: BLINDED BY THE LIGHT
description:
Game made entirely in lines!

Controls:

Keyboard or Controller

Movement: WASD, Arrowkeys or Joystick (try things)

Teleport: Shift, R, Actually most keys are bound to this ability!

Beware the level design is "unpolished" and hard. 

How maed: 

Engine: Unity

Audio: Fl Studio

Graphics: Exclusively Gl.lines
